titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the Mary Frances Switzer Papers 1911-1945
titlestmt.subtitle: Switzer, Mary Frances Mss. Acc. 2006.65

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid created by Special Collections Staff, 2011

frontmatter.titlepage:
Inventory of the Mary Frances Switzer Papers, 1911-1945 A Collection in the
Special Collections Research Center Mss. Acc. 2006.65
Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary 2012 &contact;
Processed By

archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.abstract: Papers, letters and photographs of Mary Frances Switzer of Florida who served as a WWII Army nurse in France. Letters are from friends and family, but mostly from her sometime beau, Allen Galer, who writes about the ups and downs of their relationship.
did.origination: Switzer, Mary Frances Galer, Allen arrangement

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open to all researchers

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Before reproducing or quoting from any materials, in whole or in part, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Research Center, and the holder of the copyright, if not Swem Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Mary Frances Switzer Papers, Special Collections Research Center, Swem Library, College of William and Mary.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The materials were acquired by Special Collections Research Center on 10/21/2006.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Mary Frances Switzer of Florida served as a World War II  Army nurse in France.  Further information about this individual or organization may be available in the Special Collections Research Center Wiki: http://scrc.swem.wm.edu/wiki/index.php/Mary Frances Switzer.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Papers, letters and photographs of Mary Frances Switzer of Florida who served as a WWII Army nurse in France. Letters are from friends and family, but mostly from her sometime beau, Allen Galer, who writes about the ups and downs of their relationship.

arrangement.head: Arrangement of Materials
arrangement.p: Letters are in chronological order. Photographs are divided by identified, unidentified, landscapes and people.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: This Collection is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.
